scopes.description: OAuth scopes used by this API

key.description: The key used to refer to this scope

name.description: The name for this scope shown to users in the OAuth journey

context.description: The unique context for the API

version.description: The identifier for the version of the API

status.description: The current lifecycle status for this API. Either ALPHA, BETA, STABLE, DEPRECATED or RETIRED

endpointsEnabled.description: Whether the endpoints for this version are available to call

access.description: Used to indicate whether this API is public or private. If absent, the API defaults to public

type.description: The access type for this API. Either PUBLIC or PRIVATE

whitelistedApplicationIds.description: IDs of the applications that are whitelisted to access this API

fieldDefinitions.description: List of subscription fields for this API version

name.description: The internal identifier for this field

description.description: The description that will be shown to users for this field

type.description: The type of value expected for this field

hint.description: Hint text to display to users to help them provide a correct value for this field
